issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
Near as I can tell, both Android and iOS expose the Blob.type property, but not the constants for the type values (TYPE_IMAGE, TYPE_DATA, etc.)

At present, type is not documented in Blob.yml because it's not terribly useful without the constants. I think we should either expose the constants or not expose the 'type' property.
fields.summary: Ti API: Blob.type is exposed as property, but type values are not exposed as constants

comments.body: Not actually a parity issue, as far as I can see--I don't think the constants are exposed on any platform.
Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress in the past 5 years.
